message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to negotiate a better price. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

Bob, I understand you're looking to negotiate a better price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $850000. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to meet you halfway at $875000. I think this is a fair price considering the market value and the benefits you'll gain from acquiring the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $825000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the market value and the benefits I'll gain from acquiring the product.

Bob, I can see you're still looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $825000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to meet my minimum requirements. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $860000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.

I understand that this is your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $835000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the market value and the benefits I'll gain from acquiring the product. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need you to come down a bit more.

Bob, I understand you're trying to negotiate a good deal, but I've already made a concession by offering you a price of $860000. I'm not willing to go any lower than that. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $860000, and that's my final offer. If you're not interested, I'll have to consider other options.
